description: According to information received from reliable sources, Shastri wants Bharat Arun (bowling coach), Sanjay Bangar (batting coach), R Sreedhar (fielding coach), Patrick Farhart (physio), Sankar Basu (trainer) and Raghu (a team assistant) to be retained.
title: Ravi Shastri wants team of 6 assistants retained if picked

description: European champions Spain, who begin their quest for a third consecutive European Championship against the Czech Republic on June 13, suffered a shock first defeat since March 2015 losing 1-0 at home to Georgia in their final warm-up on Tuesday.
title: Spain slump to shock Georgia defeat ahead of Euros

description: Defending a modest 189 for nine, the Proteas bowlers were resisted only by Australian opener Aaron Finch's defiant 72 before he was ninth out as the World Cup-holders folded for 142 off 34.2 overs in Guyana.
title: Rabada takes 3/13 as SA beat Australia by 47 runs

description: The expansion of the continental tournament from 16 to 24 teams is being widely seen as a dilution of the competition which, according to many pundits including Zinedine Zidane in past, was a tougher nut than the World Cup.
title: Euro 2016: The underdogs of soccer war

description: On team director Ravi Shastri's statement on Virat Kohli and how he is ready to lead India across formats, MS Dhoni said, "It's not that I don't enjoy the game. This decision will be taken by the BCCI, it's not for me to decide".
title: BCCI will decide on my future, says MS Dhoni

description: Tiger Woods, the 14-time major champion, confirmed Tuesday he will miss the US Open, third time in six years, at Oakmont next week, saying he's still not ready to resume competition after back surgery last September.
title: Tiger Woods says he's 'not ready' for US Open

description: If all cricketers dream of playing at Lord's, Sri Lanka's wicketkeeper Kusal Perera has more reason than most to hope he's selected for Thursday's third Test against England at the spiritual home of the game.
title: Sri Lanka's Kusal Perera eager for return at Lord's

description: As India's hunt for cricket's new chief coach gathers momentum, Mahendra singh Dhoni, who has worked with quite a number of coaches during his decade-long career, on Tuesday said the candidate must understand the country's culture.
title: Coach should understand our culture, says MS Dhoni

description: Paes was forced to play with rookie Vishnu Vardhan in 2012 London Games since Bopanna preferred to partner Mahesh Bhupathi in men's doubles. India have won only one Olympic medal in the tennis discipline and it was Paes, who won a bronze in the men's singles at the 1996 Atlanta Games.
title: Hope London fiasco is not repeated: Leander Paes

description: India were trailing 0-1 in the 16th minute through a Khonesavanh Sihavong strike but replied in a remarkable fashion, dominating all through the remaining part of the match, pumping in six goals -- including three in seven minutes -- to walk away with an easy win.
title: India thrash Laos 6-1 to book Asian Cup Qualifiers berth

description: KL Rahul says the lessons he learnt from the likes of Virat Kohli and AB de Villiers while playing for IPL team Royal Challengers Bangalore have made him a better cricketer and he would look to "express" himself in the Zimbabwe tour beginning Saturday.
title: Kohli, De Villiers helped in improving my cricket: Rahul

description: London Olympics bronze medallist MC Mary Kom remained hopeful of competing at the Rio Games as a wild card and said she is keeping herself fit hoping to make the trip.
title: Mary Kom hopeful of wild card, keeping herself fit

description: The retired swashbuckler, McCullum, recalled getting surprised at the way his revelations were handled by John Rhodes — a representative of the ICC's anti-corruption unit.
title: ICC was casual in gathering fixing evidence: McCullum

description: The 29-year-old Djokovic, who took Becker on as a coach for the 2014 season, captured his first French Open on Sunday to become only the eighth man to complete a career Grand Slam. Becker said his coaching prowess came to the fore in his ability to "analyse opponents and matches."
title: I'm a better coach than player, Becker says after Novak win

description: A report on Tuesday quoted Sourav Ganguly as saying that the final of the Super League would be played under lights.
title: Eden Gardens to trial pink ball matches in June

description: A total of 425 gave Nottinghamshire victory by 20 runs in a game which saw an unprecedented 870 runs scored in the day, three more than Surrey and Glamorgan managed in 2002.
title: Records tumble in English county one-day game

description: During break, Kohli will croon the Premier Futsal's official anthem among other things. It will not be the first time that he will sing a song in public - he had earlier sung at a dinner hosted by the Bangladesh High Commission in Dhaka - he said he is nervous.
title: Enjoying my time away from cricket: Virat Kohli

description: Two days after her loss to Garbine Muguruza in the French Open final, Serena Williams scored a different win on Monday, when Forbes Magazine reported she has overtaken Maria Sharapova as the world's highest-paid sportswoman.
title: Serena tops Maria as world's highest paid sportswoman

description: Vijender will face former European champion Kelly Hope of Australia for the WBO Asia Pacific Super Middleweight Championship title fight in the capital on July 16.
title: I'll try to go to Rio Olympics, says Vijender Singh

description: Tiger Woods, the 14-time major champion, said in a statement on his website that he is writing a book about his historic victory in the 1997 Masters, which will be published by Grand Central Publishing next year.
title: Tiger Woods to pen memoir of 1997 Masters triumph
